nodes.text:
Star Wars Annual is a book published in 2011 by Pedigree Books in the United Kingdom.
2012's annual was a special starships and technology edition. Within the annual, there are many Holcoron datafiles which look at starships and technology in Star wars. The starship or the piece of technology is looked at well, complete with a detailed fact file and a picture and caption. Also, below the facts, there is a grid with that starship or piece of technology in. The reader can then use the grid to draw their own version of the ship in a grid adjacent. Using the grid, can create a very good duplicate. The puzzles and creative activities also follow starships and technology as well. All six Star wars films are told in detail as a photo story.
